tool.name: Beacon2 Biosamples
tool.description: Query the biosamples collection in the beacon database for samples taken from individuals
tool.command: beacon2-search biosamples --db-host '$db_host' --db-port $db_port --database '$database' --collection '$collection' --advance-connection --db-auth-config '$credentials' #if str($advanced_settings.biosampleStatus) --biosampleStatus '$advanced_settings.biosampleStatus' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.collectionDate) --collectionDate '$advanced_settings.collectionDate' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.collectionMoment) --collectionMoment '$advanced_settings.collectionMoment' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.identification) --identification '$advanced_settings.identification' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.diagnosticMarkers) --diagnosticMarkers '$advanced_settings.diagnosticMarkers' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.histologicalDiagnosis) --histologicalDiagnosis '$advanced_settings.histologicalDiagnosis' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.obtentionProcedure) --obtentionProcedure '$advanced_settings.obtentionProcedure' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.pathologicalStage) --pathologicalStage '$advanced_settings.pathologicalStage' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.pathologicalTnmFinding) --pathologicalTnmFinding '$advanced_settings.pathologicalTnmFinding' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.featureType) --featureType '$advanced_settings.featureType' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.severity) --severity '$advanced_settings.severity' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.sampleOriginDetail) --sampleOriginDetail '$advanced_settings.sampleOriginDetail' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.sampleOriginType) --sampleOriginType '$advanced_settings.sampleOriginType' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.sampleProcessing) --sampleProcessing '$advanced_settings.sampleProcessing' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.sampleStorage) --sampleStorage '$advanced_settings.sampleStorage' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.tumorGrade) --tumorGrade '$advanced_settings.tumorGrade' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.tumorProgression) --tumorProgression '$advanced_settings.tumorProgression' #end if > biosamples_query_findings.json

param.label: BIOSAMPLE STATUS
param.help: Ontology value for the classification of the sample in abnormal sample (EFO:0009655) or reference sample (EFO:0009654)

param.label: COLLECTION DATE
param.help: Date of biosample collection in ISO8601 format

param.label: COLLECTION MOMENT
param.help: Individual's or cell culture age at the time of sample collection in the ISO8601 duration format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S, e.g. P32Y6M1D, P7D

param.label: ID
param.help: Biosample identifier (external accession or internal ID)

param.label: DIAGNOSTIC MARKERS
param.help: Clinically relevant bio markers, e.g. T2b Stage Finding

param.label: HISTOLOGICAL DIAGNOSIS
param.help: Disease diagnosis that was inferred from the histological examination, e.g. Serous Cystadenocarcinoma

param.label: OBTENTION PROCEDURE
param.help: Ontology value describing the procedure for sample obtention, e.g. biopsy

param.label: PATHOLOGICAL STAGE
param.help: Pathological stage, if applicable, e.g. Stage IIIA

param.label: FEATURE TYPE
param.help: Definition of an ontology term which describes the phenotype, e.g. Infantile spasms

param.label: SEVERITY
param.help: Ontology class that describes the severity of the condition, e.g. Moderate

param.label: SAMPLE ORIGIN DETAIL
param.help: Tissue from which the sample was taken or sample origin matching the category set in 'sampleOriginType', e.g. wall of urinary bladder

param.label: SAMPLE ORIGIN TYPE
param.help: Category of sample origin. Value from Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) material entity, e.g abnormal sample

param.label: SAMPLE PROCESSING
param.help: Status of how the specimen was processed, e.g. mechanical dissociation

param.label: SAMPLE STORAGE
param.help: Status of how the specimen was stored

param.label: TUMOR GRADE
param.help: Term representing the tumor grade, e.g. Grade 3a

param.label: TUMOR PROGRESSION
param.help: Tumor progression category indicating primary, metastatic or recurrent progression, e.g. Primary Malignant Neoplasm

tool.help: Beacon2 Biosamples queries the biosamples collection in the Beacon database for samples taken from individuals. This tool allows detailed queries using advanced settings such as biosample status, collection date, diagnostic markers, and more.
